name: Banke Bihari Temple
about: Famous temple dedicated to Banke Bihari (combined form of Radha-Krishna).

name: Prem Mandir
about: Massive marble temple dedicated to divine love of Radha and Krishna.

name: ISKCON Temple
about: Sri Sri Krishna-Balarama Mandir of the ISKCON movement.

name: Radha Raman Temple
about: Historic temple housing the deity Radha-Ramana, established around 1542 CE.

name: Radha Damodar Temple
about: One of the seven principal Goswami temples, founded 1542 CE by Jiva Goswami.

name: Radha Vallabh Temple
about: Historic Radha-Vallabh temple, first erected in 1585 A.D.

name: Radha Madan Mohan Temple
about: One of the oldest temples, built in Mughal-influenced Nagara style.

name: Sri Ranganatha (Rangaji) Temple
about: South-Indian style temple dedicated to Lord Ranganatha (Vishnu).

name: Gokulananda Temple
about: Houses deities of Radha-Vinoda, Radha-Gokulananda, and others.

name: Pagal Baba Temple
about: Seven-story white temple dedicated to Lord Krishna.

name: Seva Kunj
about: Legendary grove believed to be where Radha-Krishna performed Ras-Leela.

name: Nidhivan
about: Mystical forest where Krishna is believed to perform nightly Ras-Leela.

name: Priyakant Ji Temple
about: Temple with a lotus-shaped structure surrounded by water.

name: Bhuteshwar Mahadev Mandir
about: Shiva temple, one of the Shakti Peeths in Mathura.

name: Gopeshwar Mahadev Temple
about: Dedicated to Lord Shiva, established by Krishna’s descendant Vrajanabha.

name: Dauji Mandir
about: Dedicated to Balarama (Krishna’s elder brother), over 5000 years old.

name: Dwarkadhish Temple
about: Historic temple dedicated to Lord Krishna in Mathura.

name: Shri Krishna Janmabhoomi Temple
about: Believed to be Lord Krishna’s birthplace.

name: Radha Rani Temple (Barsana)
about: Historical temple of Radha, located on Bhanugarh Hill.

name: Sri Rambag Mandir
about: First Ram temple in Vrindavan, built in the Ramanandi Sampradaya.

name: Vrindavan Chandrodaya Mandir
about: A modern geodesic temple complex being built, will be tallest temple upon completion.

name: Keshi Ghat Temple
about: Riverside temple at Yamuna’s ghat tied with Krishna’s slaying of demon Keshi.

name: Katyayani Peeth
about: Shakti Peeth dedicated to Goddess Katyayani in Vrindavan.

name: Sri Ranganatha (Rangaji) Temple
about: South-Indian style temple dedicated to Lord Ranganatha (Vishnu).

name: Radha Govind Ji Temple
about: One of the Seven Goswami temples, dedicated to Radha-Govind.

name: Radha Shyamsundar Temple
about: Another of the Seven ancient Goswami temples.

name: Radha Gokulananda Temple
about: Sacred temple housing the deity Sri Radha–Gokulananda.

name: Gurudwara Braj Bhoomi Sahib
about: Sikh pilgrimage site marking memory of Guru Nanak’s visit to Vrindavan.

name: Jagannath Temple
about: Temple dedicated to Lord Jagannath in the Braj region.

name: Nidhivan Temple
about: Adjacent to Nidhivan forest, dedicated to Banke Bihari.

name: Chaurasi Khamba Temple
about: Historic site with 84 carved pillars (Khamba).

name: Kusum Sarovar Temple
about: Sacred pond with memorials and temples in Govardhan region.

name: Giriraj Temple
about: Dedicated to Govardhan Hill (Giriraj), revered by devotees.

name: Nandgaon Temple (Nand Bhavan)
about: Birthplace of Nand Baba, Krishna’s foster father.

name: Barsana Temple Complex
about: Group of temples, including Radha Rani Temple, in Barsana.

name: Gokul Temple (Dauji Mandir)
about: Temple in Gokul dedicated to Balarama, known as Gokul’s stalwart.

name: Vrindavan Ghats (Keshi Ghat)
about: Scenic Yamuna ghat associated with Krishna’s legend of demon Keshi.

name: Goverdhan Parikrama Path Temple
about: Shrine en route Govardhan Parikrama path.

name: Devanand Temple
about: Temple dedicated to Devananda Swami in Vrindavan.

name: Ashta Sakhi Temple
about: Temple dedicated to the eight beloved companions of Radha-Krishna.

name: Yogmaya Temple
about: One of oldest temples in Mathura, built during Indo-Greco period.

name: Kaliya Ghat Temple
about: Temple on Yamuna ghat associated with Krishna’s Kaliya demon story.

name: Brindavan Niketan
about: Prayer center and spiritual guesthouse in Vrindavan.

name: Chintamani Temple
about: Temple devoted to Lord Gopal Chintamani.

name: Sita Ram Temple
about: Dedicated to Lord Rama and Sita in Mathura city.
